data.question: What is the decomposition temperature of Zr-MOFs?
Can Zr-MOFs resist exposure to 10 tons/cm2 of external pressure?
What is the highest coordination reported for a MOF?
What happens to the Zr6-cluster upon removal or addition of μ3-OH groups?
data.answer: It rearranges reversibly without any changes in the connecting carboxylates.

data.question: Is the overall framework structure of Zr-MOFs changed upon dehydroxylation?
What is the Langmuir surface area of UiO-66?
Does increasing the length of the linkers in Zr-MOFs reduce their stability?
What is the effect of increasing the length of the linkers on the surface area of Zr-MOFs?
data.answer: It increases the surface area of the material.

data.question: Are Zr-MOFs resistant to most chemicals?
What is the coordination of zirconium atoms in the Zr6O4(OH)4(CO2)12 cluster?
Does the synthesis of Zr-MOFs involve serendipity?
data.answer: Yes, in terms of how the organic linkers will coordinate with the inorganic unit.

data.question: What is the shape of the cluster formed by zirconium atoms in Zr-MOFs?
Can the crystal structure of Zr-MOFs be determined by single crystal diffraction?
data.answer: No, it is solved from powder X-ray data.

data.question: What is the effect of dehydroxylation on the Zr6-cluster?
data.answer: It results in a Zr6O6 inner cluster with seven-coordinated zirconium.

data.question: Do Zr-MOFs remain crystalline after exposure to mechanical pressure?
What is the role of the inorganic brick in the stability of MOFs?
data.answer: It mainly controls the stability of the framework.

data.question: Is the structural transformation of the Zr6-cluster upon dehydroxylation reversible?
What is the effect of increasing the length of the linkers on the window opening of Zr-MOFs?
data.answer: It increases the size of the window opening.

data.question: Are Zr-MOFs resistant to solvents like water, DMF, benzene, and acetone?
What is the effect of mechanical pressure on the powder XRD pattern of Zr-MOFs?
data.answer: The powder XRD pattern remains virtually unaltered.
